title: Did Obama propose "more flexibility" towards Russia after the 2012 elections?
subtitle: In 2012, President Obama heard on a hot microphone telling President Dimitri Medvedev of Russia that he would have "more flexibility" to negotiate with Putin after the elections.
author: David Emery
vclaim: President Obama picked up a hot microphone telling Russian President Dmitry Medvedev that he would be more flexible to negotiate issues such as missile defence after the 2012 elections.
